entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫2.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫399,99 ~ ‚Ç∫2.499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

Having won over 160 awards and nominations including a BAFTA, Divinity: Original Sin 2 finally comes to Mac. Form a party and experience true branching gameplay with a story unique to each player, in a world filled with evil and abandoned by the gods. Your choices matter, so choose wisely, and know that only one of you can become the new Divine! Warning: before purchasing, please verify if your machine meets the requirements listed below. Features: - Play as one of 5 fantasy races, each with their own personalities and stories: Elves, Dwarves, Lizards, Humans, and the Undead. - Explore a vast world full of loot, treasures, upgrades, and stories with unprecedented branching narratives. - Turn-based combat featuring the elements of nature: combine fire, earth, water, air and everything in between to take down your enemies. - Talk to animals and ghosts to gain unique insights about the world and its secrets. - Up to 4 players online or 2 player split-screen coop. - Hold CMD when launching the game to access language and configuration options. Requirements: to check your Mac model, select "About This Mac" from the Apple menu in your menu bar. OS: - macOS 10.14.2 Mojave (or higher) recommended - macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra supported Supported hardware: - MacBook Pro: all since late 2016 - MacBook Air: all since mid 2017 - iMac: all since late 2014 with Radeon graphics, and all iMacs since mid 2017 - Mac Pro: all since 2019 - Mac mini: all since 2018 - eGPU: all official eGPU modules based on AMD GPUs HDR requirements: - macOS 10.14.2 or higher - Any iMac capable of 500Nits display that supports Automatic Brightness Adjustment.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Texas Poker: Pokerist Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium BundleÔºö‚Ç∫6.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫4.999,99 [‚Ç∫4.999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫6.999,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99

In-App Purchases

  • Premium BundleÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • 15M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • 1.5M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • 1M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • 5M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • 150M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • 500k chipsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Vault of chipsÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • 50M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫2.499,99
  • 100k chipsÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever! ‚óÜ Game features ‚óÜ ‚Ä¢ FREE CHIPS ‚Äì Play the game every day to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ BOOST POKER TOURNAMENT ‚Äì A Texas Hold'em tournament where you spin the reel for a chance of winning 15 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game! ‚Ä¢ SPECIAL MODES ‚Äì Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more! ‚Ä¢ MTT TOURNAMENTS ‚Äì The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Defeat lots of worthy competitors at several tables to reach the final table! ‚Ä¢ TOURNAMENTS¬†‚Äì Participate in weekly Sit'n'Go tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard! ‚Ä¢ CASINO GAMES ‚Äì Enjoy a variety of casino games. Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Poker‚Äîall in one application! ‚Ä¢ VIP LEVELS ‚Äì Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features! ‚Ä¢ FAIR PLAY GUARANTEED¬†‚Äì All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. We guarantee the best and fairest Texas Hold'em experience! ‚Ä¢ CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERS¬†‚Äì Have even more fun at the casino tables with our convenient in-game chat, instant messenger and animated emoji. Discuss the hands played or share your emotions with your poker opponents and friends! ‚Ä¢ REFERRAL SYSTEM ‚Äì Invite your friends to play, everyone will get a reward! ‚Ä¢ BUILD YOUR PROFILE ‚Äì Share your successes with friends. Show off how many games you've played, your biggest wins, level, card collections, achievements, property and trophies! ‚Ä¢ UNIQUE AVATAR ‚Äì Create a one-of-a-kind look in the avatar editor. ‚Ä¢ QUESTS ‚Äì Complete daily quests to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ EASY LEARN TO PLAY ‚Äì Are you new to Texas Hold'em poker but always wanted to try it? Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps. ‚Ä¢ NO REGISTRATION¬†‚Äì Get straight into the action. Choose guest mode to use our free casino app without registering. ‚Ä¢ SINGLE ACCOUNT¬†‚Äì Play on different devices. Choose the authorization method that works best for you and start playing Texas Hold'em poker right away for free! Subscribe to our social media pages and be the first to find out about our promotions and latest news! Facebook: https://facebook.com/Pokerist Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pokeristclub YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/KamaGamesChannel X: https://x.com/KamaCasino This game is only available to users of legal age. The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value. Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

All Price Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pack IVÔºö‚Ç∫79,99
  • Pack IIÔºö‚Ç∫29,99
  • Pack IIIÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • Pack IÔºö‚Ç∫19,99

Application Description

Immerse yourself in a world of solitary enjoyment as you navigate through beautifully crafted courses. Solo mini golf brings the classic game to your fingertips with easy to master controls. Pull the ball aim and release to take your shot with precision. Revel in the satisfaction of the perfect putts as you conquer rounds with obstacles, speed and many more. ¬† Download solo mini golf now and discover the perfect blend of challenge, serenity and solo golfing fun.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Card.NoteÔºöÂ∞èÊüê‰π¶Áôæ‰∏áÂçö‰∏ªÁßÅËóèÊé®ËçêÁöÑÊâãË¥¶Á±ªApp ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•Âç°Áâá‰∏∫‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÁöÑÊûÅÁÆÄËÆ∞‰∫ã App Ôºõ ‰Ω†ÂÜôÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊÆµÊñáÂ≠óÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁîüÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†Âº†Á≤æÁæéÁöÑÂç°Áâá „ÄÇ ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôËØó„ÄÅÁü≠Êñá„ÄÅÈöèÊÉ≥Ôºõ ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ÂÆÉÊù•ÂÜôÊó•ËÆ∞„ÄÅÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅËßÑÂàí„ÄÅË¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºõ ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Áî®ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•Êù•ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™Áû¨Èó¥ÁöÑÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ „ÄåCard.Note„Äç‰πùÂ§ßÁâπÁÇπÔºö 1.ÊûÅÁÆÄËÆæËÆ° Âæ™ÁùÄÊûÅÁÆÄÁöÑËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÁªìÂêàÂõæÊ†áÂèäÊâãÂäøÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËΩªÊùæ‰∏äÊâã„ÄÇ 2.ÊñáÈùíÂÆöÂà∂ Á≤æÈÄâ‰∫Ü 10 Ê¨æËÆ∞‰∫ãÂ≠ó‰ΩìÂèä 9 ÁßçÊñáÈùí‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤Âç°„ÄÅÂ§öËææ 100 Áßç‰∏çÂêåÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑËâ≤Âç°ÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÂÆöÂà∂ÂêÑÁßçÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ 3.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂç°ÁâáÂåñ ÂÖÖÂàÜËûçÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂç°ÁâáËÆæËÆ°ÁêÜÂøµÔºåÂèØÊ†πÊçÆÂñúÂ•ΩÈöèÊÑèÂàáÊç¢Ê®™ÁâàÊàñÁ´ñÁâà‰∏§ÁßçÂç°ÁâáÁ¨îËÆ∞ÊòæÁ§∫Ê†∑Âºè„ÄÇ 4.ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊâãÂäøÂåñ ‰∏ãÊãâÂèØÊñ∞Âª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂÜç‰∏ãÊãâÂèØ‰øùÂ≠òÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÂè≥ÊªëÂèØÂëºÂá∫‰ΩúÂìÅÈõÜÔºåÈïøÊåâÂç°ÁâáÂèØÈ¢ÑËßàÂç°ÁâáÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ 5.ËØ≠Èü≥ÂΩïÂÖ• ÊâìÂºÄ‰æøÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØ≠Èü≥ËæìÂÖ•ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÂÖâÊòæÁé∞ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ï„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÂΩì‰ΩúÊàêiOSÊñáËâ∫Áâà‚ÄúÈó™ÂøµËÉ∂Âõä‚Äù„ÄÇ 6.Ë¶Å‰∫ãÊèêÈÜíÔºö ÂèØËÆæÁΩÆÊèêÈÜíÈóπÁßçÔºåÈáçË¶Å‰∫ãÊÉÖÂíåËÆ°Âàí‰∏çÂÜçÈîôÂ§±„ÄÇ 7.Âø´Êç∑È´òÊïà ÊîØÊåÅWidgetÂ∞èÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂèØÁõ¥Êé•Âú®Â∫îÁî®ÂõæÊ†áÊàñWidgetÂø´ÈÄüÊâìÂºÄÂ∫îÁî®ÊàñÁõ¥Êé•ËøõÂÖ•ÂàõÂª∫Á¨îËÆ∞ÁïåÈù¢ÔºåËÆ©‰Ω†ÈöèÊó∂È´òÊïàÂú∞ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ÂøµÂ§¥„ÄÇ 8.iCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠• ÊîØÊåÅiCloud‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÔºåÂ§öÂè∞ËÆæÂ§áÈó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÂèØ‰ªªÊÑèÂêåÊ≠•„ÄÇ 9.Ê∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°Âºè ÂÖ®Â±ÄÈÄÇÈÖçÊ∑±Ëâ≤Ê®°ÂºèÔºåËßÜËßâËàíÈÄÇ‰∏çÂà∫Áúº„ÄÇ ÊÑüË∞¢‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁîüÊ¥ªÊÑâÂø´„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊúâÈóÆÈ¢òÊàñÂª∫ËÆÆÔºåËØ∑ËÅîÁ≥ªÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÂæÆÂçöÔºöÂúüÂë≥ÊñáËâ∫ÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ ÈÇÆÁÆ±Ôºöyande18@126.com

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD.
